text: Stack recommendations for small/medium-sized web application in Python
I'm looking for some recommendations for a python web application.
We have some memory restrictions and we try to keep it small and lean.
We thought about using WSGI (and a python webserver) and build the rest ourself.
We already have a template engine we'd like to use, but we are open for some suggestions regarding the whole request handling (the controller).
The application has to run in a single process and the requests have to be processed with multiple threads.
We've looked at django, but we are a not sure if it fits into our memory budget.
